function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Severe restrictions to mobility exacerbating social inequalities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic recession highlighting risks associated with hyper-connected economic and financial systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global connectivity and trade promote the use of cheap and long-distance transportation, increasing the risk of contagious diseases spreading globally.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Restricted mobility and economic activity during the covid-19 crisis led to improved air quality but uncertain impact on climate change and biodiversity conservation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Drop in greenhouse gas emissions during lockdowns, driven by reduced transportation and energy demand, drew attention.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prioritization of economy over sustainability may lead to relaxation of conservation policies and environmental measures.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial support directed at incumbent industries with high employment may hinder the development of green energy technologies.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unsuitable use of global recovery funds could result in inadequate investment in sustainable energy development.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global reliance on fossil fuels and lack of subsidies for sustainable alternatives","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to achieve sustainable development goals sdgs by 2030","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of policies addressing the interrelation between biodiversity conservation, food security, and pandemic prevention","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Tropical deforestation and wildlife trade increasing the risk of future zoonosis outbreaks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic growth contributing to biodiversity loss and environmental
